about_dialog.description_text: Character management application for Dark Age of Camelot (DAOC), developed in Python with PySide6.

about_dialog.credits_intro: This project would not be possible without the contributions of various open-source projects, data sources, and the DAOC community.
about_dialog.special_thanks_text: Testers and friends who made this project possible:

about.title: About {app_name}

stats_info.title: About Statistics
stats_info.message:
â„¹ï¸ Important Information

The displayed statistics (RvR, PvP, PvE and Wealth) are cumulative since character creation.

ğŸ“Š Global Data:
â€¢ Total since character creation
â€¢ No reset per season
â€¢ Complete history of all actions

ğŸŒ Data Source:
Eden's Herald website does not provide statistics per season, only the total cumulative values for the character's entire existence.

This means that the displayed values represent your entire journey on this character, across all seasons.

Data is stored locally on your machine.

data.title: Data Management
data.subtitle: Data files and armoury paths

Data files (classes, races, realm ranks, etc.) are located in the program's Data/ folder.

To modify this data, use the Tools > Data Manager menu.

armory.title: Armory
armory.subtitle: Import and management of items database
armory.desc_text: The armory allows you to import items from Zenkcraft files (.txt) and create a local items database with their stats, resists, bonuses and merchant information.

superadmin.title: SuperAdmin - Administrative Tools
superadmin.warning: These tools modify the embedded source database. Reserved for developers only.
superadmin.build_button_tooltip: Select multiple template files to build source database
superadmin.realm_tooltip: Realm to use if not detected from filename
superadmin.options_merge_tooltip: Add new items without deleting existing ones
superadmin.options_remove_duplicates_tooltip: Avoid duplicate items based on name and realm
superadmin.options_auto_backup_tooltip: Create backup before modifying source database
superadmin.clean_duplicates_tooltip: Remove duplicate items from source database
superadmin.single_refresh_tooltip: Re-scrape specific items from Eden to update their data (Model, DPS, Speed, etc.)
superadmin.all_refresh_tooltip: Re-scrape all items from Eden to update their data (Model, DPS, Speed, etc.)
superadmin.database_editor_tooltip: Open editor to directly modify items_database_src.json
superadmin.single_refresh_input_message:
Enter item names to refresh (comma-separated):

Examples:
â€¢ Cloth Cap
â€¢ Cudgel of the Undead, Soulbinder's Belt
â€¢ Ring of the Azure

âš ï¸ Exact case-sensitive names required
superadmin.all_refresh_confirm_message:
Refresh ALL items from the source database?

This will re-scrape all items from Eden Herald to update:
â€¢ Model ID (for future 3D rendering)
â€¢ DPS, Speed, Damage Type (weapons)
â€¢ Type, Slot (equipment)
â€¢ Merchant price and zone
superadmin.all_refresh_warning: This operation may take several minutes.
superadmin.all_refresh_filter_message:
Do you want to bypass utility/level filters for ALL items?

âœ… YES = Skip filters (get all variants)
âŒ NO = Apply filters (utility â‰¥ 100, level â‰¥ 50)

âš ï¸ This will affect ALL items in the database
superadmin.filter_bypass_message:
Do you want to bypass utility/level filters?

âœ… YES = Skip filters (get all variants)
âŒ NO = Apply filters (utility â‰¥ 100, level â‰¥ 50)
superadmin.auto_backup: An automatic backup will be created.
superadmin.database_import_tooltip: Open Template Import Items Tools window to select and import templates into database
superadmin.backup_database_tooltip: Create a manual backup of items_database_src.json
superadmin.refresh_items_tooltip: Re-scrape all items from Eden to update data (Model, DPS, Speed, etc.)
superadmin.no_files_selected_message: Please select at least one .txt file
superadmin.clean_confirm_message:
Do you want to remove duplicates from the source database?

A backup will be created automatically.
superadmin.refresh_confirm_message:
Do you want to refresh all items in the source database?

This will re-scrape all items from Eden Herald to update:
â€¢ Model ID (for future 3D rendering)
â€¢ DPS, Speed, Damage Type (weapons)
â€¢ Type, Slot (equipment)
â€¢ Merchant price and zone

âš ï¸ This operation may take several minutes.
A backup will be created automatically.
